patent.title: Anti-theft security device for a vehicle coupling
patent.snippet: A theft security device for a vehicle coupling located in a vehicle is described, in particular a fifth wheel coupling (1). patent.title: Automobile anti-theft system
patent.snippet: The invention discloses an automobile anti-theft system, which comprises a first camera module, an image processing and recognizing module, a control module, a storage module, a remotely-controlled sensing module and an automobile door lock control module. patent.title: steering column lock
patent.snippet: The invention relates to a steering column (1) for a vehicle. The steering column (1) comprises a steering shaft (2) rotatably supported by the steering column (1). patent.title: Lockable cover for electronic control unit
patent.snippet: An electronic control unit (ECU) may include a central processing unit (CPU); an interface that can engage with at least one vehicle component; and, a lockable ECU cover that covers at least a portion of the ECU and that limits access to the ECU.
